name: Rayhan Malika Ramadhani - Electronic Engineering
description: I am a dedicated Electronic Engineer with expertise in embedded system design, microcontroller-based automation (ESP32, Arduino, Raspberry Pi), and sensor and actuator integration for IoT-based solutions. Having experience in hardware development, embedded system programming (C/C++/Python), and PCB design using software such as KiCad and EasyEDA. Experienced in handling practical projects such as PZEM-based energy measurement, temperature & air quality monitoring systems, and MQTT and PID-based automatic control systems. I am also accustomed to working in cross-disciplinary teams, managing technical documentation, and delivering work results in the form of a user-friendly dashboard or HMI interface.
